name: Dave Lombardo
description:
'''David Lombardo''' (born February 16, 1965) is a Cuban-American drummer, best known as a co-founding member of the [[thrash metal]] band [[Slayer]]. He currently plays drums with [[Fantômas (band)|Fantômas]], [[Dead Cross]], [[Mr. Bungle]], [[Empire State Bastard]], and [[Misfits (band)|Misfits]].

Lombardo previously played drums on nine Slayer albums, including ''[[Reign in Blood]]'' (1986) and ''[[Christ Illusion]]'' (2006). His music career has spanned over 40 years, during which he has been involved in the production of 35 commercial recordings covering a number of genres. He has performed with numerous other bands, including [[Grip Inc.]], Philm and Fantômas, in addition to Slayer.

Lombardo is widely known as an aggressive heavy metal drummer. His drumming has been praised as "astonishingly innovative". ''[[Drummerworld]]'' named him "The Godfather of [[Double-bass drum|Double Bass]]". He has had a significant influence on the metal scene and inspired modern metal drummers, particularly [[extreme metal]] drummers.
